website_summaries.verdict: The HTC Desire 816's combination of solid design and quality performance strikes all the right chords to make it a compelling phone for its price.
pros: The HTC Desire 816's plastic body is well built
The brilliant 5.5-inch HD display has excellent viewing angles, and the quad-core processor runs smoothly, with hardly any lag
cons: The glossy plastic rear is a fingerprint magnet, which is especially noticeable on the darker models
The lack of a removable battery is disappointing, given its relatively small capacity

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best thing about the phone are the 2 front facing speakers. The design is a little whack, volume and power buttons are on the left side of the phone. Phone looks ok, the display is not that bad for a mid range phone. Phone runs smooth just a little lag every now and then nothing major. Disappointed in the camera especially the front facing camera which is suppose to be 5mp dont expect any good selfies from this its really terrible. Annoyed outta this world with the chinese apps, even blinkfeed was in chinese had to turn it off could not change it to english at all.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot and keep buying. There is timeliness and the products are the same as described.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Perez Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, one small need.
customer_reviews.text: As it was being shipped to a US address, then one would have thought English paperwork would have been shipped with it. Customer service was quick to email us the website for the English user's guide and a number to call to change the phone to complete English (while I could change the language, all the aps came across in an Asian language).
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this phone unless you want a Chinese ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this phone unless you want a Chinese based platform. The browser, apps, security and Blinkfeed are made for the Chinese market and while you can choose English as your language, the Blinkfeed will remain in Chinese. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a unlocked cell phone, I got a ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a unlocked cell phone, I got a locked cell phone, I'm with virgin mobile, i got a Sprint only phone, check my order
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Sucks
customer_reviews.text: The screen on the phone didnt work from the moment I got it. Couldnt even get it unlocked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy locally if you can but if you can't this isn't terrible
customer_reviews.text: Came with creepy Chinese big brother firmware. Fairly sure it was sending my facebook login back to the glorious empire. Flashed it 4 times with different firmwares. Finally found one the works. Phone is pretty decent now except that it doesn't seem to like the Australian 4g networks and the WiFi network card is giving hilariously poor performance.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: NOT HAPPY, DEVICE DEFECTIVE, WARRANTY WITH SELLER EXPIRED IN 15 DAYS
customer_reviews.author: francisco j vieyra

customer_reviews.title: And it looked like it was "infested" with a lot of unnecessary firmware ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected to get this phone with headphones but i didnt.And it looked like it was "infested" with a lot of unnecessary firmware which is kind of disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: bismark l

customer_reviews.title: A good phone for me
customer_reviews.text: This phone is very good for me. I never would have guessed it work this good. At occasions it will glitch but I personally think it's because I dropped it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Plastic piece of crap had Japanese Software and couldn't update to sense 6 piece of Japenese Big Brother crap
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Beware it might not support the band frequency on your area for DATA, and its a chinese version
customer_reviews.text: This is a china version it has a chinese character even you set it on english language,and beware because it might doesn't have a data signal, like 3G on your area, it happens to me, because i'm working on a cruise ship and i have a different SIM on every country, only few country can support his Band frequency
customer_reviews.author: Cloyd

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery life far from what I expected. Some menu options are in Chinese for initial setup.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger 77

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months, this phone just quit working. A shame, since I had many photos contained on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed D.

customer_reviews.title: please be more specific
customer_reviews.text: Said it would work with Virgin Mobile network but it doesn't
customer_reviews.author: C. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone, the only problem is Blinkfeed is in a chineese and it can't be changed to english.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Brathwaite

product_meta.title: HTC Desire 816w 5.5 inch Android 4.4 MSM8228 Quad Core 1.6GHz 13.0 MP Dual Sim Unlocked 3G HSPA Smartphone Color White
product_meta.description:
HTC Desire 816w
Size:156.6 x 78.74 x 7.99mm 
Weight: 165 g
Display: 5.5 inch
CPU Speed: 1.6GHz quad-core CPUsPlatform 
Android: Android 4.4
HTC BlinkFeed
Dual Sim SIM Card Type Nano SIM
Network 2G – GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz 3G - WCDMA/HSPA 900/1900/2100MHz
Memory Total storage: 8GB, available capacity varies RAM: 1.5GB Expansion card slot supports microSD memory card for up to 128GB additional storage (card not included)
GPS Internal GPS antenna + GLONASS
Sensors: Accelerometer
Connectivity 3.5 mm stereo audio jack Bluetooth 4.0 Wi-Fi: IEEE 802.11 b/g/n
Camera 13.0MP back camera, front camera 5.0MP with fixed focus 1080p Full HD video recording
Multimedia Audio supported formats: Playback: .wav, .mp3, .xmf, .amr, aac .wma (Windows Media Audio 9) Recording: .amr, .aac
Language: English, Chinese. 
Video supported formats: Playback: .mp4, .wmv (Windows Media Video 9), H.263, H.264 Recording: .mp4, H.263, H.264,
Battery Capacity:2600 mAh
Talk time: Up to 13.7 hours for 3G Up to 16 hours for 2G
feature_bullets: Dual Sim Card Nano Sim Card 2G: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz; 3G:WCDMA/HSPA 900/1900/2100MHz
Memory Card slot microSD, up to 128 GB Internal 8 GB, 1.5GB RAM
FEATURES OS Android OS, v4.4 Quad-core 1.6 GHz ,Messaging SMS, MMS, Email, Push Email Browser HTML5
Double Camera, Front Camera 5.0MP, Back Camera 13.0MP, Support 1080p video

Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.
